title: How do i know if i lose one game i get demoted?
body:
Is there a way to know if i lose one more game i get demoted?
I didn't lose one game yet while in 0 lp but im afraid of getting demoted...
Im gold V

replies.body: You won't immediately drop by losing with 0 LP, but [**losing multiple games at 0 will eventually drop you**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760#h3q2).
